description:
Vegeta’s rage inspires Black to draw upon his own anger and unleash a devastating new ability. Mortal arrogance is proving to be a large enough thorn in Future Zamasu’s side that a permanent decision must be made!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Agame yo! Tatae yo! Gattai Zamasu Bakutan!!
Lobet und Preiset ihn! - Die Urknallgeburt des fusionierten Zamasu!
Revere Him! Praise Him! Fusion Zamasu`s Explosive Birth!!
¡Alabadme y adoradme! ¡El nacimiento de la fusión de Zamas!
崇めよ! 讃えよ! 合体ザマス爆誕!!
